title: FS 1905 J.T. Dye NY Giants color scorecard postcard, Mathewson - no longer available
author: T206Jim

posts.post_title: FS 1905 J.T. Dye NY Giants color scorecard postcard, Mathewson - no longer available
posts.post_content:
In honor of the new Postcard section on BST let me kick things off with this 1905 J.T. Dye NY Giants color scorecard postcard in good condition.

Nice early color postcard with action shots of Mathewson and McGinnty.

xxx postage paid, regular Paypal is fine.
